item.description:
UPDATED:  We will meet in the hotel lobby at 1 PM on Saturday, and then head to lunch from there.  I will be wearing a red wool cloak and carrying a meetup sign.  I'll probably be at con starting at 11 AM so you are welcome to come find me.

"New England's largest and most diverse science fiction and fantasy convention." I've heard many people say positive things about this con so I'd like to check it out. It will be interesting to go to a con in the middle of a Bostonian winter and see what kind of costumes will be there. I'd love to meet up with some of you to explore the con together, or for lunch/dinner to share experiences if our time and interests conflict. Pre-reg is $50 for 4 days before Dec 31st, then $60 afterwards. I plan on attending starting Friday evening or Sat morning until Monday. http://2012.arisia.or...
item.name: Arisia 2012 - Jan 13-16
